name: Shoot Marble Ball
description:
Shoot Marble Ball is a delightful and unique matching game, and make the game much more interesting and challenging.
Complete all the levels in challenge mode, and try to get three stars in each level.

How to play:
1. Shooting to match three or more colored balls.
2. Tap on the transmitter can swapping the current ball and the next ball.
3. Combo and Chain increase score
4. More marbles, higher score;
5. Use props to help you pass the level.

Features:
- Classic mobile gaming experience
- Stunning effects and HD graphics
- Hand eye coordination.
- Smooth user interface
- Many secret maps to make the game more addictive.
- Easy to learn, but difficult to become master of the game challenging.
